price: Na akiwa katika watu wa upande wa kulia,
arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنۡ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ
footnotes: Ama akiwa katika watu wa mkono wa kulia,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā in kāna min aṣḥābi al-yamīni
